books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP

books.author: by James Patterson and Marshall Karp
books.description: When a young man finds a bag of diamonds, he gets the attention of the Ghost, a major assassin.
books.name: KILL ME IF YOU CAN

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: Bruce Peyton's pregnant wife has left him, and he's not the only one with problems. Book 11 of the Cedar Cove series.
books.name: 1105 YAKIMA STREET

books.author: by CJ Lyons
books.description: A woman finds no closure after a man is executed for the murder of her husband and son.
books.name: BLIND FAITH

books.author: by Darcie Chan
books.description: Only one man knows an abused widow's secret, which revealed will change many lives in her Vermont town.
books.name: THE MILL RIVER RECLUSE

books.author: by Chris Culver
books.description: Against orders, a former homicide detective begins an investigation into his niece's murder.
books.name: THE ABBEY

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: Routinely doing business from his Lincoln Town Cars, the bottom-feeding attorney Mickey Haller is asked to defend the scion of a wealthy family who might not be guilty of a murderous crime.
books.name: THE LINCOLN LAWYER

books.author: by Jayne Castle
books.description: After 15 years, Charlotte Enright and her teenage crush, Slade Attridge, have returned to Rainshadow.
books.name: CANYONS OF NIGHT

books.author: by Tatiana de Rosnay
books.description: A contemporary American journalist investigates what happened to a little girl during the roundup of Jews in Paris in 1942.
books.name: SARAH’S KEY

books.author: by David Nicholls
books.description: Checking in year by year on the confused, halting romance of two children of the '80s.
books.name: ONE DAY

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher is stationed with his family on a military base in Okinawa in the mid-1970s.
books.name: SECOND SON

books.author: by Susan Mallery
books.description: Montana Hendrix has found her calling — working with therapy dogs. And now perhaps she has found Mr. Right.
books.name: ONLY YOURS

books.author: by Jeaniene Frost
books.description: Having narrowly averted an underworld war, Cat Crawfield wants nothing more than a little downtime with her vampire husband, Bones. Unfortunately, she will have to face another battle instead.
books.name: ONE GRAVE AT A TIME

books.author: by George R. R. Martin
books.description: After a colossal battle, the Seven Kingdoms face new threats; Book 5 of “A Song of Ice and Fire.”
books.name: A DANCE WITH DRAGONS

books.author: by Stephanie Laurens
books.description: Heather Cynster is to be wed, but not before she encounters kidnapping, danger and a daring rescue at the hands of Viscount Breckenridge.
books.name: VISCOUNT BRECKENRIDGE TO THE RESCUE
